document_data.name: Jurash
document_data.mainbody: '''Jurash''' was a [[priest]] of [[Ishistu]] and cultist of the [[Shorn]] who inhabited [[Moradask]] in the [[Burning Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Jurash captured a [[desert centaur]] named [[Tebessa al-Khawati]] as she was bathing in an oasis near the [[Sea of Salt]]. He attempted to shave all of the hair from Tebessa's body to serve as a sacrifice, but succeeded only in removing her proud warrior's braid before she was rescued.
